programme.title: Good Bones
programme.desc: Despite its odd layout and decrepit state, Mina and Karen are taking on an old house with a ton of historic charm in the Old Southside neighborhood. As framing starts, the crew uncovers a major structural problem that hits the budget hard.

programme.title: Good Bones
programme.desc: Mina and Karen work to gut a condo and make it a dream home for Mina's sister and her two girls. The remodel includes personalized touches, including a special mural made by Mina, Karen and the kids.

programme.title: Good Bones
programme.desc: Mina and Karen purchase a home near the Northside neighborhood that's full of historical features. They work on an open floor plan, but structural slow-downs and permitting nightmares threaten their schedule and budget.

programme.title: Good Bones
programme.desc: Mina and Karen are in Old Southside, but this time they're working in a transitional area. They've purchased a duplex of townhomes that will need both sides renovated, but for now they're focusing on the left side.

programme.title: Good Bones
programme.desc: With her son in tow and another baby on the way, Mina returns to Old Southside where she and Karen aim to turn a creepy, insect-infested lot into a chic oasis for a new family. Along the way, they make a sentimental connection to the home's past owner.

programme.title: $50K Three Ways
programme.desc: From a batting cage basement to a main bedroom suite stuck in the '80s, this family's home has problems on literally every level. Tiffany is ready to get this house in line, but a slew of unforeseen hiccups immediately starts to eat away at their budget.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: A single mother looks to purchase a wealth-building home for her and her daughter in Miami, Florida. She's looking for a ranch-style house and doesn't mind a fixer-upper, but her unwillingness to bend on price may prove to be unrealistic.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: A young family looking to move from Florida to California is searching for the perfect home in the tight Los Angeles market, but their conflicting location and size needs could quickly derail their California dream.

programme.title: House Hunters International
programme.desc: A newly divorced woman looks to challenge herself and seeks adventure in Madrid, Spain. She's looking for a traditional Spanish neighborhood with easy access to public transportation, but on her budget, there will need to be some compromises.

programme.title: Good Bones
programme.desc: Mina and Karen are in Old Southside, but this time they're working in a transitional area. They've purchased a duplex of townhomes that will need both sides renovated, but for now they're focusing on the left side.

programme.title: Good Bones
programme.desc: Mina and Karen find that "you get what you pay for" when they buy a bargain house for $5,000.

programme.title: Good Bones
programme.desc: Mina and Karen venture just east of downtown Indy to take on a two-storey, worn-down home that's as risky as it is disgusting. The house has almost no sustainable foundation, so the ladies try to rebuild from the ground up while adding features.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Jon Knight must preserve the history of a 280-year-old farmhouse while also making it feasible for modern living. When he learns that part of the foundation is beyond saving, he makes the shocking proposition to the owners to tear down half of the home.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: A historical house from 1873 is transformed into a vibrant, modern home for a young family. Jon Knight and Kristina Crestin give this family of five a home with fun colors, shiny brass, whimsical bird wallpaper and even a beehive.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: It's a sugary sweet renovation when Jon Knight and his team tackle a baker's 1910 home. Together, Jon and Kristina Crestin give her a charming, retro kitchen that any baker would love and a luxurious main suite the single mom truly deserves.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Jon and Kristina take on their biggest renovation when they make over a couple's horse farm. They're tasked with combining all their clients' requests - an old-world kitchen, a moody club room and a country club exterior - into a single, cohesive home.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: An outdated farmhouse is transformed into a functional family home with an earthy design. Jon Knight and Kristina Crestin create a kitchen fit for a chef, a cozy, traditional New England family room and even a goat jungle gym for their new farm animals.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Jon Knight and Kristina Crestin have their biggest budget yet to overhaul an old family home while honouring three generations of memories. They give this family a breezy, coastal home full of sentimental touches and nods to their farming history.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: A woman that operates a day care out of her house is having trouble selling since buyers can't visualize her business as a family home. Lyndsay and Leslie transition the commercial space back into a cozy residence with a vintage farmhouse style.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: A woman is overwhelmed with trying to sell her mom's underwhelming condo. Lyndsay and Leslie step in to reinvent condo living by remodeling the space for mature buyers with a modern Mediterranean design that showcases its stunning ocean view.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: Selling their rental home is the only thing preventing a couple from starting their daughters' college fund, but it's in rough shape. Leslie and Lyndsay take a stab at transforming the worn-out house into a sophisticated showplace for first-time buyers.

programme.title: Top Chef

programme.title: Top Chef

programme.title: Top Chef

programme.title: Top Chef
programme.desc: The chefs honor the area where James Beard spent his summers, creating both a hot dish and a cold dish with one of his favorite ingredients, Dungeness crab. Kwame Onwuachi and Nina Compton serve as guest judges.

programme.desc: Danny has big plans for a big client. Ryan discovers that smaller jobs aren't always easier, as he attempts to put a Counts Kustoms paint job on a high-tech Lego car.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny and the team are commissioned to restore a 1941 Triumph motorcycle back to its World War II-era glory. Even with a $50,000 budget, the project turns into one of the biggest challenges in Count's Kustoms history.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: The crew continues to piece together a WWII era Triumph motorcycle for a client hoping to have it as a tribute to his family's military roots.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny gets hired to do a full bumper-to-bumper restoration on a '66 Mustang Convertible. Unfortunately, when the car is stripped down, they find there's not a whole lot of car between the bumpers.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny and the team continue wrestling with the stock restoration Mustang mess, hoping for some extra funds and a lot of patience from their client.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Ryan reluctantly goes down the Caddy customization wormhole on a personal project, and everyone at the shop is happy to watch him go, just to see how great it turns out.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Shannon recruits the guys to help him finish up a gift for Danny: a bike he started building for him 10 years ago. Ryan works to keep Danny out of the shop so that Shannon can finish the bike, and winds up buying a sweet Baja Bug in the process.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny's got himself a new ride, a classic two-wheel drive Chevy Blazer that he wants to trick out and flip for a big profit. Painter Ryan wants to try out a new twist on a retro flame design, but Danny is worried that it will look too 'Miami Vice.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny makes an old Ford Econoline look so cool that, in the end, two buyers get into a bidding war for it. Danny can score big, but only if he can let his baby go. Also, Mike and Roli find a BMW motorcycle with a lot of history.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny takes in a dune buggy to trick out in outrageous Count's Kustoms style, and then gets into some seriously higher horse powered fare at the Shelby Heritage Foundation.

programme.title: Ultimate Rides
programme.desc: Check out five modified supercars that prove there is always room to improve on perfection.

programme.title: Ultimate Rides
programme.desc: Check out five custom hotrods that scream individuality, style, and power.

programme.title: Ultimate Rides
programme.desc: Danny discovers what happens when a jet engine is fitted to the most unlikely vehicles.

programme.title: Ultimate Rides
programme.desc: Danny checks out five of the baddest custom pickups. Take a ride in a Ford pickup that appears to be driving backwards, an 8-wheeled custom truck that's been a 20-year labour of love for its owner.

programme.title: Ultimate Rides
programme.desc: Danny shows off a Camaro with a huge 32 inch rims. Later, meet the Swiss automotive futurist who decided to design a convertible that drives on land and can go underwater. In England, take the Evolution E-Type Jaguar for a spin.

programme.title: Ultimate Rides

programme.desc: A daughter writes to Santa asking him to help her recently widowed mother find love again.

programme.desc: A lifestyle guru is forced to prove she is a romance expert during an interview for her dream job.

programme.desc: A separated couple fakes marital bliss on national television to help their town's Christmas festival, and their business.

programme.desc: A book editor is tasked with working with her former rival to help a potential writer find her way.

programme.title: A Bramble House Christmas
programme.desc: A man goes undercover to discover the truth about his father's final days.

programme.desc: A recently unemployed woman steps in to run her family's Christmas tree farm after her father suffers an injury. She finds herself in a battle with a new business that no longer wants to host the Christmas tree lot.

programme.title: Christmas Wonderland
programme.desc: An artist is forced to put her life on hold and return home to help her family. While at home, she finds herself working closely with her high-school sweetheart who is desperately searching for a home for his school's Christmas dance.

programme.title: Christmas Incorporated
programme.desc: Riley miraculously lands an assistant position with a headstrong, wealthy entrepreneur. He is being forced to play Scrooge and close one of his factories weeks before Christmas. Riley convinces him to visit the town, and hatches a plan.

programme.title: A Princess for Christmas
programme.desc: A young woman takes her niece and nephew to the English countryside to visit their grandfather, a royal duke, for Christmas. While there, she unwittingly falls for a dashing prince.

programme.title: A Gingerbread Romance
programme.desc: An architect and her team enter a contest to build a life-size gingerbread house. When her baker falls through, she is forced to outsource to a local bakery and instantly falls for the baker, a single dad, and they spend the holidays together.

programme.title: Swept Up by Christmas

programme.desc: A bestselling Christmas author reconnects with the man who inspired her novel and stood her up on a date in New York.

programme.title: Once Upon a Christmas Miracle

programme.title: The Devil Speaks

programme.title: Raw Terror
programme.desc: Narleen Campton was found viciously beaten to death in her own home after she didn't contact her daughter Sabrina on Thanksgiving. Who would want to murder the 62-year-old grandmother? The investigation unravels a murky world of drugs and violence.

programme.title: The Perfect Murder
programme.desc: Wisconsin police are shocked in 2010 to find an elderly couple brutally murdered in their home. When family and neighbors start receiving death threats, police fear the killer isn't done. Can they solve the case before they strike again.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me
programme.desc: A 911 dispatcher is found slumped behind the wheel of a wrecked sedan with a bullet through his torso. To catch the killer, Demery must retrace the victim's final steps and untangle a web of accusation and innuendo spun by a shady cast of characters.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me
programme.desc: The cold-blooded execution of an affable middle-aged couple sends shockwaves of fear through their normally quiet community. Clues are scarce, until Demery and Mayfield uncover a cache of threatening text messages from a pair of mysterious numbers.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: The prime suspect in the murder of an American teacher while living in Seoul, South Korea, in 1988 speaks publicly about the case for the first time in 30 years.

programme.title: Murder Decoded
programme.desc: After a young woman goes missing, children find her body disposed of in a rural community miles away. Forensic experts decipher surprising animal hair fibers and DNA evidence, which puts detectives on the trail of an enraged predator.

programme.title: Lone Star Justice
programme.desc: The homicide of William Young has gone cold but not for Det. Joe Rasco. After more than a decade, he'll track down every player again to provide the answers to get justice once and for all for William and his family.

programme.title: Swamp Murders
programme.desc: 22-year-old mom Shawn Williams heads to the store late one night and never comes home. When her body is found the following day along an Oklahoma river, investigators wonder if one of the men in Shawn's life might be her killer.

programme.title: Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: A recent law graduate goes missing weeks before the bar exam. Family, friends and investigators collaborate to uncover the mystery of where she went, and who put her there. A revelation puts her inner circle under suspicion until the killer is revealed.

programme.title: Dead Silent
programme.desc: After Heather Young and her boyfriend relocate to Michigan's tranquil Lower Peninsula, a nasty fight leads to an explosive and terrifying outcome.

programme.title: In Pursuit with John Walsh
programme.desc: John follows the trail of fugitive Leroy Headley whose 911 call sends police down a dark and twisting path that unravels a history of violence. Cal uncovers hidden truths behind the case of Jeffrey Forrest, a dangerous sexual predator on the run.

programme.title: Murder Calls
programme.desc: A man calls 911 claiming he found his ex-girlfriend dead, and his behavior on the call leads police to wonder if he could be involved. Investigators tirelessly gather evidence to convict a killer whose unchecked rage left a young son motherless.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: Thirty-one-year-old, Gabriel Montanez is found shot in a liquor store parking lot in Kalamazoo, Michigan. Two men in hooded sweatshirts are seen fleeing from the scene. Police then make a shocking discovery that leads to the truth behind the homicide.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: Roaa Al-Dhanoon has disappeared. What begins as a missing persons case, takes a disturbing turn by someone who is closest to her. Now, detectives must unravel a complex web of deceit that continues to strike fear throughout the devastated community.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here: Shadows of Death
programme.desc: In 2003, a young man in Georgia shoots his father in the head sixteen times. Days later, the dismembered body of a nun turns up on the side of a Virginia road. The story behind these two crimes haunts those involved to this day.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a young woman is found mysteriously slaughtered on the steps of a trailer, Kenda and the homicide team must track down the vile perpetrators responsible for a horrifying string of cold-blooded murders.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: Steven Begay is a loving uncle whose nephews see as a protector. So, the irony could not be greater when his bloody body is found near a playground in New Mexico. A manhunt ensues leaving police with a major discovery that turns the case on its head.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here: Shadows of Death
programme.desc: In 2003, a young man in Georgia shoots his father in the head sixteen times. Days later, the dismembered body of a nun turns up on the side of a Virginia road. The story behind these two crimes haunts those involved to this day.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A 13-year-old girl is missing, sending Kenda's city into a panic. Who is responsible? Just when investigators think they've got a handle on what is going on, a cryptic letter to the District Attorney's office suggests the girl isn't the only victim.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: Maurice Goins, a friendly neighbor who provides meals to other tenants in his apartment complex, is found murdered in his bedroom. The case goes cold, until Lakewood, Ohio police suddenly receive a tip and the investigation is thrown into overdrive.

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: CeCe Coffee is a Southern Belle with a beautiful home but very little home security. In a bizarre case of mistaken identity, she falls prey to a brutal home invasion that will force her to think on her feet if she wants to stay alive.

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: When a single mom breaks up with her volatile boyfriend, she finds out he has other plans for her. Armed with a gun, he holds her hostage. As her life hangs in the balance, she has no idea her friend on the SWAT team is determined to save her.

programme.title: Scorned: Love Kills
programme.desc: Lee Ann discovers the dark side of her husband, gym-owner Paul, and runs for help. Alex offers a shoulder to cry on; Rocco takes her to bed. But then, Paul and she seem to work things out—until late one night, when shots ring out behind the gym.

programme.title: Scorned: Love Kills
programme.desc: In 2008, Sam and Mirinda Boob are the toast of the tiny town of Centre Hall, Pennsylvania. But the former cheerleader has a taste for betrayal and it sends her right into the arms of a cold-blooded killer.

programme.title: Married With Secrets
programme.desc: When Jean Claude Dominique is the victim of a hit-and-run, his wife Eliette rushes to his side. It's there she comes face-to-face with his OTHER wife. It's her first glimpse into his double life that leads to her fighting for her own.

programme.title: Married With Secrets
programme.desc: When Ignacio Garraus meets Shawna Nelson, there's instant heat – despite them both being married to other people. While he's just looking for a good time, she's falling in love.

programme.title: Married With Secrets
programme.desc: A mother and her two young sons vanish in rural Wyoming, prompting a nationwide search. Leads dry up and the case goes cold... until a dark secret is revealed, leading investigators to another homicide they had no clue could solve four murders.

programme.title: Forbidden: Dying for Love
programme.desc: While her husband serves in the army, a lonely married mother of three finds comfort in the arms of her church's charismatic new minister. But danger looms in the form of a jealous love-rival that will stop at nothing to scare her away.

programme.title: Forbidden: Dying for Love
programme.desc: A decorated marine faces war at home when he falls for a married woman. Suspicion and jealousy plague their affair as they battle to keep their secret from their spouses but with the stakes so high it's a truth they'll stop at nothing to hide.

programme.title: Forbidden: Dying for Love
programme.desc: A rookie cop struggles to resist temptation when he meets a beautiful exotic dancer while on shift. But he's keeping secrets not just from his sergeants but his new girlfriend too. And he'll stop at nothing to keep his double life secret.

programme.title: Fatal Vows
programme.desc: Young, rich, and religious, John and Nikki Hillrich fall in love at college. It's a match made in heaven- but hell is not far off. When desire collides with faith, secret lives marked by sinful liaisons and menacing new friends shatter their perfect life.

programme.title: Fatal Vows
programme.desc: Sheriff deputies with a perfect marriage reveal a shocking tale of good cop/ bad cop that can only end in a fugitive on the run.

programme.title: Fatal Vows
programme.desc: An ambitious Harlem couple dreams of a better life for themselves. Unfortunately they're stuck in a bitter cycle of poverty poor health and mistrust leading one of them to decide to put their dreams to rest, forever.

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: As a prominent family awakens to noises in the night, their worst nightmare ensues when their beloved daughter Terri Ann McCoy is fatally shot. Investigators work through leads and lies to discover the perpetrators were closer than they realized.

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: Lightning strikes twice in the desert town of Socorro, New Mexico, when Crystal Houston is found murdered just 14 months after her older sister, Stephanie, is killed in a suspicious accident.

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: The double homicide of a young mother and her 21-month-old daughter sends Galax's tiny police force on a frenzied mission to stop unspeakable evil in its tracks.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: The building of a backyard shed destroys a years long, close relationship between two neighbors and ignites a vicious conflict that sees property destroyed, pets killed, and finally two people shot to death in cold blood.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: A former cop moves into a close-knit neighbourhood. Conflict soon arises with the whole community over dogs, noise, and other disturbances that keep piling on and ratcheting up until a boiling point is reached, guns are drawn, and blood is spilled.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: When life becomes a powder keg, these morally bereft women light the sparks.

programme.title: Murder in the Heartland
programme.desc: Residents of Post Falls, Idaho, are shocked when devoted family man Bo Kirk vanishes, and his truck is found set ablaze. Bo's sister blames their estranged father, until released ATM security footage suggests a co-worker with piercing blue eyes.

programme.title: Murder in the Heartland
programme.desc: Home will never feel safe again after Jill finds her daughter Emma Walker cold to the touch in her own bed. Quickly ruling out suicide, investigators search for a suspicious man in black caught on a neighbor's home surveillance camera.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: Two neighbouring bachelors start out as friends. Harmless banter turns into threats eventually igniting an escalating war. The violence ends with a murder so shocking it is almost beyond belief.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A woman claims she accidentally shot her husband when they were re-enacting a moment from a Bugs Bunny cartoon.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: Abducted by masked gunmen and buried alive in a truck trailer underground, 26 innocent school children spent 28 hours held hostage in the dark before they made a harrowing escape.

programme.title: Deadly Recall
programme.desc: When the remains of a young mother are discovered in a remote area outside Nashville, Detective Postiglione solves the crime by recalling a detail from the wooded scene and puts a dangerous murderer behind bars.

programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: A chance meeting causes New York State Police Investigator Jim Horton of befriend infamous burglar Gary Evans.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: Former Harlem Globetrotter Rico Harris is driving from LA to Seattle and mysteriously vanishes. When his car is found abandoned in a remote area, investigators and his loved ones embark on a journey that grows more baffling as time passes.

programme.desc: Jane and Maura are called out to the BCU 'body farm' (an academic research facility dedicated to the study of human decomposition) when a murder victim is found buried in a shallow grave among the research corpses.

programme.desc: House treats a patient whose chronic pain pushes him to the edge. Meanwhile, Cuddy finds that taking care of her newly adopted baby leaves her little time to run a hospital.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: In an effort to free up more time to spend at home with her newly adopted baby, Cuddy passes some of her day-to-day responsibilities off to Cameron -- including supervising House. A power struggle erupts while evaluating a too-good-to-be-true teacher.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: House and the team take on the case of a woman who collapsed in the middle of a cooking class. They soon learn she is a highly renowned cancer researcher who recently gave up her entire career in order to pursue her own personal happiness.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: A priest who runs a homeless shelter is admitted to the ER after seeing a bleeding Jesus hovering at his doorstep. House takes on the case as a distraction for the team while he confronts Foreman and Thirteen about their relationship.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: The team encounters a teenage boy who collapsed from severe pelvic pain after playing basketball. When tests reveal the boy has genetic mosaicism (both male and female DNA), the boy's parents inform House that the boy is unaware of his condition.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: House and the team take on the case of Nick, a book editor who loses his inhibitions and starts insulting coworkers at a dinner party before falling ill. Meanwhile, House grows suspicious after catching Wilson and Taub in a lie.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: Nursing-home worker Morgan fakes a seizure to get House's attention after a cat sleeps next to her. It seems that the cat only pays a visit to people if they are about to die, and does so with alarming accuracy.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry begs Murray to get a dog, and when they finally do, Barry is disappointed to find the dog would rather spend more time with Murray than with him. Meanwhile, Erica and Lainey plan a girls-only sleepover without Beverly.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly insists the entire family gather for the holiday, but tension builds when brother-in-law Marvin tricks Pop-Pop into thinking Thanksgiving was at his house. Meanwhile, Pops passes the torch to Barry and Erica to give the holiday toast.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Inspired by 'Top Gun,' Barry decides to join ROTC. Convinced it will help discipline him, Murray orders the Captain to prevent Barry from quitting when the going gets tough, prompting Beverly to join Barry, too.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Disappointed with her unenthusiastic family during the holidays, Beverly creates 'Super Hanukkah' to get them into the spirit but it's too similar to Christmas.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Murray doesn't budge when Beverly wants to remodel their kitchen like the Kremps, so Beverly devises a plan to do the work herself. She messes it up on purpose so Murray will be forced to fix it, but things don't go as planned.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam and Emmy are ecstatic their favourite TV game show, "Double Dare," is hosting auditions at their school. But when Adam secretly asks Pops to be his partner and Emmy secretly asks Handsome Ben, the two get into a fight.

programme.title: ER
programme.desc: Carter is faced with a tough decision to make when a serial rapist is in need of a transfusion during a blood shortage. Hathaway and Weaver deliver the baby of a mentally challenged couple.

programme.title: ER
programme.desc: Mark takes Cynthia along to San Diego, where he helps diagnose his ailing mother's condition. While there, he decides that he and Cynthia have no future together, and he attempts to bridge the gap with his father.

programme.title: ER
programme.desc: The hospital has to be evacuated when workers at a chemical plant cause a toxic chemical to spread. Dr. Corday frees a trapped man during a ride-along with EMTs. Doug and Carol are trapped in an elevator with a sick child.

programme.title: ER
programme.desc: Several heroin overdose victims are brought in, including Carter's cousin. Mark tries to track down Cynthia. Doug accuses parents of child abuses but soon questions his conclusions.

programme.title: ER
programme.desc: Corday tries an experimental new procedure without the patient's permission. Scott suffers an attack during a wall-climbing expedition with Jeanie. Benton hits a pedestrian. Carter visits his cousin, who has suffered brain damage.

programme.title: ER
programme.desc: Scott decides to stop fighting his cancer. Nothing turns out quite as planned when Jerry and Mark take charge of the annual banquet. Benton takes over an operation when Morgenstern has difficulty.

programme.title: ER
programme.desc: Pregnant women and protestors become victims when an abortion clinic is bombed. Benton is suspended after the incident with Morgenstern. Carter cares for an elderly patient who may have been neglected.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: House begins a detox program to get the vicodin out of his system in an attempt to control his hallucinations. House plans to leave the facility once he's clean but he is stymied by his attending physician who recommends further treatment.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: House begins a detox program to get the vicodin out of his system in an attempt to control his hallucinations. House plans to leave the facility once he's clean but he is stymied by his attending physician who recommends further treatment.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: The team is unable to diagnose a loud-mouthed video game creator, who posts each new symptom on the Internet and opts for treatments suggested by the online community rather than by the doctors.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: When a controversial African politician falls ill, he is brought to Princeton Plainsboro for treatment. The team struggles with the idea of helping this merciless dictator who is being subpoenaed for crimes against humanity in his country.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: A wealthy businessman brings his teenage son, who is suffering from inexplicable stomach pains, to Princeton Plainsboro and insists on having Dr. House handle the case. The father of the patient believes it is the karmic penalty of his financial success.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: The team takes on the case of a reckless police detective who has a family history of sudden heart failure that killed his father, grandfather and great-grandfather at age 40. Meanwhile, Chase is haunted by his actions in the Dibala case.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: After a wild night out, a teenage girl is brought to Princeton Plainsboro with severely swollen appendages. The team must work to diagnose the young girl, who is less than honest about what happened the night she fell ill.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Special Agent Pride and Sonja are ambushed and on the run after traveling to Texas to escort a key witness for the trial of an infamous arms dealer that Pride apprehended.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: During a city-wide blackout that impedes law enforcement and emergency response teams, Pride vows to solve the murder of a family friend's fiancé.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The murder of a marine provides new clues in the first case Pride and Lasalle ever worked together, just before Hurricane Katrina struck the city and washed away any evidence. Also, the team celebrates Thanksgiving together in Pride's bar.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A string of Christmas burglaries turns deadly and the evidence leads the team to Wade's adopted son, Danny. Also, Lasalle and Brody tease Sonja about the high stakes of drawing Pride in the team's secret Santa holiday exchange.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: While Pride and the New Orleans team investigate a Russian sleeper agent who was involved with Abby's brother, Sebastian flies to D.C. to partner with Abby on the forensics in the case. Bishop drives through the night to deliver a package to New Orleans.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Special Agent Pride and the team investigate the murder of an immigrant petty officer that was staged as a suicide. Also, the team secretly creates an online dating profile for Special Agent Pride.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Special Agent Pride opens his bar to the public with a Fat Tuesday party, but the celebration is cut short when he and Mayor Douglas Hamilton are both kidnapped from their respective Mardi Gras events and held hostage by an unknown assailant.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A mystery man saves the life of a lieutenant and then disappears from the scene. Later on, the NCIS team unravels a new case when forensic evidence suggests he is a soldier who was captured in Afghanistan years ago and never found.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After tracking stolen navy TNT to a cocaine warehouse, Special Agent Pride and the team uncover a domestic ring that is producing their own cocaine and is headed by Sonja's childhood friend.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team protects a local DJ from a threatening perpetrator and investigates the murder of a navy captain who was attacked while on-air with the radio show. Also, Pride's daughter, Laurel, returns home to discuss her future plans.

programme.desc: Hathaway tries to help a dying patient locate his ex-wife and child. Carter and Anna struggle to understand a man afflicted with cerebral palsy. Doug deals with an infant's heroin addiction. Weaver cares for an elderly couple who may have AIDS.

programme.desc: A televangelist broadcasts from inside the hospital. Doug attempts a rapid detox of a methadone-addicted infant, causing a rift with Mark. Jeanie exhibits pneumonia-like symptoms. Romano realizes Corday and Benton are dating.

programme.title: What on Earth?

programme.desc: Treasure hunters have searched for a lost Incan city of untold wealth for a century, but new technology might finally locate its riches. A strange mountain in Egypt sparks an investigation into Cleopatra's gems and the tomb of Alexander the Great.

programme.title: What on Earth?
programme.desc: A heavily armored force takes over one of Syria's most ancient archaeology sites, prompting fears that its relics are being stolen. Tanks appear to be facing off in Antarctica next to an unworldly object. A water reservoir in LA suddenly turns black.

programme.title: What on Earth?

programme.title: What on Earth?

programme.desc: A lost city near Jerusalem might have been the home of Goliath. Bizarre underwater formations might point to a top-secret US weapons testing facility. A strange sighting in the Arctic could be a lost Nazi relic or the icy remains of prehistoric monsters.

programme.title: What on Earth?
programme.desc: When satellites discover a strange abandoned city frozen in time, experts investigate what caused the people who lived here to disappear overnight. Using cutting-edge tech, they follow fresh leads to uncover if this mysterious city has a dark secret.

programme.desc: When a mysterious Viking fortress lost underground for over a thousand years is discovered, experts investigate its buried treasures to reveal what caused the end of this fearsome civilization.

programme.title: A Call to Spy
programme.desc: A desperate Winston Churchill orders his new spy agency to recruit and train women as spies in the early days of WWII, leading a trio of female agents to go undercover in France. Risking their lives to build a resistance movement and sabotage the Nazis.

programme.desc: The press tests the relationship between a Hollywood star and a London shopkeeper.

programme.title: Delivery Man
programme.desc: A man, who donated sperm numerous times in his youth, finds out that he has fathered 533 children. He finds ways to meet some of them, all the while facing their lawsuit demanding to know the identity of their biological father.
